snippet: Members of the collective Anonymous were indicted on charges that they conspired to bring down at least six Web sites, including those of Visa and MasterCard.
abstract: Thirteen members of hacking collective Anonymous are indicted on charges that they conspired to coordinate attacks against prominent Web sites, including those belonging to Recording Industry Association of America, Visa and MasterCard.

byline.original: By BRIAN X. CHEN and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: Members of the collective Anonymous were indicted on charges that they conspired to bring down at least six Web sites, including those of Visa and MasterCard.

headline.main: U.S. Accuses 13 Hackers in Web Attacks
headline.print_headline: U.S. Accuses 13 Hackers in Web Attacks
